It's a Creative Agancy that provides great design, web development, animation and market strategies for clients.

I take part in ALC as an assistant of both design and development department.

The first Hackathon I participated. I was invited by one of my colleague in EXMA and we had a great time making an official website for Hsinchu City.

We held three courses of different programming languages this semester and I was responsible of JavaScript.

By teaching 2 hours a week, I introduced the begainners to the world of programming. It was very challenging and I learnt a lot.

Oct. 01 - Now
Designer & Coach @ NTUST Coding Club

NTUST Coding Club, also known as NCC, is a club based in NTUST. It aims to teach people without experience about programming.

After I joining the club for a year, I became the designer of the club as well as the coach of JavaScript Club Course.
